extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • isKingInCheckForPlayer

        public boolean isKingInCheckForPlayer(Player player)
        Check if the king of a player is in check. This function use the actual game field to get the king and the position of the other figures
        Specified by:
        isKingInCheckForPlayer in interface ICheckChecker
        Parameters:
        player - The player for which should be check if his king is in check
        Returns:
        true if the king from the player is in check

      • isKingInCheckForPlayer

        public boolean isKingInCheckForPlayer(Player player,
                                      MoveInPointFigurePairs afterThisMove)
        Check if the king of a player is in check. This function use the actual game field to get the king and the position of the other figures. But only when the position are not change with the given move. Then the position of the move are used.
        Specified by:
        isKingInCheckForPlayer in interface ICheckChecker
        Parameters:
        player - The player for which should be check if his king is in check
        afterThisMove - To check if the king is in check, when this move is done.
        Returns:
        true if the king from the player is in check

      • isKingInCheckForPlayer

        public boolean isKingInCheckForPlayer(Player player,
                                      java.util.function.Function<Point,IFigure> figureGetter)
        Check if the king of a player is in check. The function use the given figureGetter to get the position of the king and the other figure.
        Specified by:
        isKingInCheckForPlayer in interface ICheckChecker
        Parameters:
        player - The player for which should be check if his king is in check
        figureGetter - A function with them the method can get for each position which figure is on this position.
        Returns:
        true if the king from the player is in check

      • isPositionSafeForPlayer

        public boolean isPositionSafeForPlayer(Player player,
                                       Point pos,
                                       java.util.function.Function<Point,IFigure> figureGetter)
        Check if a figure can go to this field. It is not checking if the king in check when it moved.
        Specified by:
        isPositionSafeForPlayer in interface ICheckChecker
        Parameters:
        player - For which player the position should be save
        pos - The position which should be save
        figureGetter - A function with them the method can get for each position which figure is on this position.
        Returns:
        true if the other player can not reach the position

      • findKing

        private static Point findKing(Player player,
                              java.util.function.Function<Point,IFigure> figureGetter)
        Get the position of the king from a player
        Parameters:
        player - The player which should own the king
        figureGetter - A function with them the method can get for each position which figure is on this position.
        Returns:
        The position of the king
